description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
What's Changed
- Fix typo extra_model_config in README by @christian-byrne in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1099
- Add electron update and restart IPC events by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1097
- [API] Publish types for version 0.4.37 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1101
- Promise version in checkForUpdates by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1102
- Allow options to be passed to checkForUpdates by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1103
- v0.4.39 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1109
- Fix template upgrade triggers troubleshooting by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1111
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.4.36...v0.4.39
